author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_status.html: Update after 0.13.0.

author: sussman
msg: Time to make the donuts... and release the tarball.
* svn_version.h (SVN_VER_MINOR): bump to release 0.13.0
* CHANGES:  tweak a bit, move 'modules' to non-visible section.
* repos_upgrade_HOWTO:  remove the patch from the file;  instruct
people to checkout the 2092 branch in order to do repository dump.

author: sussman
msg: Patch to improve speed of undeltification for r2092 branch.
This is a HACK, only applied to this branch.  Should make repository
conversion easier for people.
* /branches/fs-convert-2092/subversion/svnadmin/main.c:
(do_deltify_undeltify, deltify_undeltify, main):  new helper funcs
do the recursion outside of the filesystem, thus not sucking up
locks within the berkeley trail.

author: sussman
msg: Create branch of r2092;  people can use this branch to convert old
repositories.

author: sussman
msg: Bugfix:  receiving a copied directory during an update over DAV was
failing.  Patch by Ben and CMike.
When mod_dav_svn constructs a vsn-rsc-url, it's not always safe to
append the newest path to the created-rev -- for copied subtrees in
particular.  It's not safe to return "CR/old_path" either.  Thus for
now, we attempt to return "CR/latest_path" as long as the latest path
actually exists in CR and is the same node.  Otherwise, we just return
"target-rev/latest-path".  The only impact of this is that future HTTP
caching will be a teeny bit less efficient.
* util.c (dav_svn_build_uri):  remove useless rev_root arg;  use
revision arg to build VERSION resource.
(dav_svn_get_safe_cr): new function to determine if it's safe to
return "CR/latest_path" instead of "target-rev/latest-path".
* update.c (send_vsn_url): use new dav_svn_get_safe_cr.
* dav_svn.h (dav_svn_build_uri):  no more rev_root arg, update
docstring requirements for version-urls.
(dav_svn_get_safe_cr):  new prototype.
* repos.c (dav_svn_prep_version): update call to dav_svn_build_uri.
* version.c (dav_svn_get_option): same.
* liveprops.c (dav_svn_insert_prop): same.  for version-url, use new
dav_svn_get_safe_cr func.
* merge.c (send_response): same. for version-url, use new
dav_svn_get_safe_cr func.
(dav_svn__merge_response): same.
* copy_tests.py (receive_copy_in_update):  new regression test.
